sections.heading: from state; termination; notice to Secretary of State
sections.text: Every notary public removing from the State of Nebraska shall notify the Secretary of State of such removal. Such a removal shall terminate the term of his office.SourceLaws 1869, ยง 12, p. 25;G.S.1873, p. 496;Laws 1883, c. 58, ยง 2, p. 249;R.S.191
